author: Lord Madvox
comment: I feel compelled to write a review of this app. It is absolutely beautiful. I am mad about watches and this app alone is making me want to update my smartwatch. I love this type of display and there are so many good ones to choose from I just can't choose which I like best. Absolutely great craftsmanship here!

author: C Wolfe
comment: Absolutely Fantastic!! Crisp. Clean & Brilliant Lum. Beautifully done! A tap action to show/hide digital time would be great. Thank you! 😎⌚👍

reply.author: Watchmaker Collective
reply.content: Thanks for the glowing review. On the tap to hide,  this version will most likely stay like this. There is a deluxe version coming out that will have a tap to start stopwatch that will replace current time while running. Other things too coming...
